Edis comes in is sort of trying to decide how can I scope it out in a way that makes sense um and

Crea creating a syntactic bias right you're creating a language with a certain syntax that biases the program

tool um so why did it not work well we think there are several reasons for that
and one of them is this yes why does it not work if it's slower I could very
quickly write a program that fails but it takes me a long time to write a program that works so why is it bad to
get the right answer more slowly
um because the whole point was to sort of allow very quick roundt trip times

us but not by enough of a margin for us to feel happy with what we produced
um so that that's I think one one part of it um yeah so I guess not enough for us

think we didn't do so great was this idea that you could debug by just a few examples of what is correct and

Precision um all right the other problem was that we tried to use probabilistic error mod
